scripts.db-init: npm run db-schema && npm run db-base
scripts.env-local: npm run db-init && npm run db-local
scripts.env-dev: npm run db-init && npm run db-dev
scripts.env-test: npm run db-init && npm run db-test
scripts.coverage: npm install && npm run-script pretest && node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -x '**/app.js **/resources/index.js **/modules/**' ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --  test/files && node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js check-coverage
